title: Italy
subtitle: Cycle from Venice to Florence
short_description: Cycle 150 picturesque miles between the iconic Italian cities of Venice and Florence. Pedal along lush waterways and orchards, up the green, rolling climbs of the Appenines, and through charming Tuscan villages. Rest in the comfort of 3 and 4 star hotels. Sip wine, eat gourmet meals, and soak in classically beautiful culture and scenery.
